mapper.select: select show_no as no, show_date as showDate, show_start_time as startTime, show_end_time as endTime, movie_no as movieNo, hall_no as hallNo from show where show_no = #{value}
select show_seat_no as no, show_no as showNo, seat_no as seatNo, booking_no as bookingNo, is_reserved as isReserved from show_seat where show_no = #{value} order by show_seat_no

select s.show_seat_no as no, s.show_no as showNo, s.seat_no as seatNo, s.booking_no as bookingNo, s.is_reserved as isReserved, c.hall_no as hallNo, c.seat_row as row, c.seat_column as column, c.seat_type as type, c.seat_section as section from show_seat s, cinema_seat c where s.show_no = #{value} and s.seat_no = c.seat_no order by c.seat_no
select count(*) from show_seat where show_no = #{value} and is_reserved = 'N'
